img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f5/Wukong_UpperHollow_37.jpg)
The Venom Daoist usually starts with his most basic attack, holding both swords to his side, and then springing forward with a dual slash on your right. He'll quickly follow up by rolling over to stab at the ground, and then after a moment leap into the air to slam down on top of you.
img_below_text:
With a quick dodge to the side and behind him, you can avoid his first two attacks, and then sidestep his leap and begin your counterattack -- as it takes him several moments to rise up a second time.
![Wukong UpperHollow 39.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_UpperHollow_39.jpg)
summary_promot:

        - Following Text: "With a quick dodge to the side and behind him, you can avoid his first two attacks, and then sidestep his leap and begin your counterattack -- as it takes him several moments to rise up a second time.
![Wukong UpperHollow 39.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_UpperHollow_39.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat encounter in *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist battling the "Venom Daoist" enemy. The player character is wielding a staff, surrounded by a dark, eerie environment with skeletal remains scattered on the ground. The health bar for the Venom Daoist is visible, along with the player's interface displaying abilities, resources, and "Will" currency. This scene aligns with the preceding and following text, which describes the enemy's attack patterns and strategies for dodging and counterattacking.
